headlines.description: Seven minutes remained when Son Heung-Min struck from the edge of the area, Newcastle keeper Martin Dubravka allowing the shot to slip beyond him.

video.headline: Tottenham 1-0 Newcastle: Son sends Spurs second

tracking.trackingName: Tottenham 1-0 Newcastle: Son sends Spurs second

headlines.shortLinkText: Son winner lifts Spurs above Man City

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion halted their recent slide down the Premier League table with a hard-fought point in an uninspiring 0-0 draw against Watford.

video.headline: Brighton 0-0 Watford: Stalemate at the Amex stadium

tracking.trackingName: Brighton 0-0 Watford: Stalemate at the Amex stadium

headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton's scrappy draw vs. Watford halts slide

headlines.description: Burnley converted a stoppage time penalty through Ashley Barnes to earned a 1-1 draw with Southampton at Turf Moor on Saturday.

video.headline: Burnley 1-1 Southampton: Barnes penalty rescues point

tracking.trackingName: US ONLY Burnley 1-1 Southampton: Barnes penalty rescues point

headlines.shortLinkText: Late penalty rescues point for Burnley

headlines.description: Gonzalo Higuain and Eden Hazard scored twice as Chelsea secured a 5-0 win over bottom-of-the-table Huddersfield at Stamford Bridge.

tracking.trackingName: INET SOC Highlights Chelsea 5-0 Huddersfield Higuain & Hazard star US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Higuain, Hazard shine as Chelsea thrash Terriers

headlines.description: A moment of magic from substitute Michy Batshuayi set up Crystal Palace's second goal for Jeffrey Schlupp in the 2-0 win over Fulham.

video.headline: Crystal Palace 2-0 Fulham: Eagles strengthen Prem survival chances

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC FULL TIME HIGHLIGHT (Crystal Palace 2-0 Fulham: Eagles strengthen Prem survival chances) 2019/2/2 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Palace claim derby victory over Fulham

headlines.description: Wolves equalled their highest tally of 11 victories in a Premier League season with an impressive 3-1 win at Everton.

video.headline: Everton 1-3 Wolves: Wolves cruise to 3rd straight win

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Everton 1-3 Wolves: Neves leads Wolves to 3rd straight win) 2019/02/02 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves match club record with win at Everton

headlines.description: Bobby Reid scored twice as Cardiff City beat Bournemouth 2-0 on Saturday in a Premier League game that turned into a celebration of Emiliano Sala.

video.headline: Cardiff 2-0 Bournemouth: Bluebirds win on emotional day

tracking.trackingName: INET SOC Highlights Cardiff 2-0 Bournemouth Bluebirds win on emotional day US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Cardiff beat Bournemouth on emotional day
